name: Group
description: The unified attribute for the Group element

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: scale
content.description:
the scale of the element
default: 1.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: heed_camera
content.description:
whether this group and its contents should move relative to camera movements
default: false

content.name: clipping_active
content.description:
whether this group should use the provided clipping stencil to perform a masking operation
default: false
